Conditions.Condition: PROGRAMFILETOLAUNCHATEND <> "" And ACTION <> "ADMIN" And RETURN_VALIDATEINSTALL = "1" And RETURN_REBOOTREQUESTED = "0" And NOT Installed
PROGRAMFILETOLAUNCHATEND <> "" And ACTION <> "ADMIN" And RETURN_VALIDATEINSTALL = "1" And RETURN_REBOOTREQUESTED = "0" And NOT Installed
ProgressType2="installed" And ((ACTION<>"INSTALL") OR (NOT ISENABLEDWUSFINISHDIALOG) OR (ISENABLEDWUSFINISHDIALOG And Installed))
ProgressType2="uninstalled" And ((ACTION<>"INSTALL") OR (NOT ISENABLEDWUSFINISHDIALOG) OR (ISENABLEDWUSFINISHDIALOG And Installed))
ISENABLEDWUSFINISHDIALOG And NOT Installed And ACTION="INSTALL"

InstallUISequence.Condition: Not Installed And (Not PATCH Or IS_MAJOR_UPGRADE)
Installed And Not RESUME And Not Preselected And Not PATCH
Installed And (RESUME Or Preselected) And Not PATCH
